Chat Cord

Real time Chat app buit with Socket.io

About this project

This poject was made with Socket.io and nodejs.This project is a chat web app with diffrent rooms. You can chat real time without the need to refresh the page!

go live see code

Details

Front End

I used javascript to manipulate the DOM , and make this website dynamic. When a message sent, the site run a function that change the DOM to display the message.

Socket.IO

I used socket.io with node JS server to make a web app that make it possible to send and get messages on real time!

Main Lesson

naming a Varible is an important task because i faced a lot of troubles when i tried to cath the emited events when i misspelled the name of the events.
